**Function**

- [sumAsync1( a, b )](#sumAsync1)

## Function

### <a id="sumAsync1" href="#sumAsync1">#</a> sumAsync1( a, b ) ⇒ `Promise<any>`

Returns the sum of a and b

##### Parameters

| Name | Type     |
| ---- | -------- |
| a    | `number` |
| b    | `number` |

##### Returns

`Promise<any>` – Promise object represents the sum of a and b
